entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
